alert.note: Alert for St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:31PM CDT until September 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Patterson Memorial Airport, or 7 miles north of Patterson, and is moving south around 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Franklin, Patterson, Cypremort Point, Burns Point, Bayou Vista, Baldwin, Ellerslie, Patterson Memorial Airport, Glencoe, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island, Charenton, and Centerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
